full_summary:
==============================================================

Tender Announcement: Electrical Exit Light Replacement
---------------------------------------------------------

**Notice:**
*   Solicitation Number: WS4332464484
*   Date of Publication: 2023-12-05
*   Closing Date: 2024-01-11 (2:00 PM ET)
*   Status: Expired

**Project Overview:**
*   Title: Electrical Exit Light Replacement
*   Location: 3701 Carling Ave, Ottawa, Ontario

**Background Information:**
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) intends to replace the exit lights at 3701 Carling Ave, Ottawa, Ontario.

**Tender Requirements:**
*   Work must be completed within 20 weeks from contract award
*   Provide all necessary supporting documentation with the bid submission
*   Submission must be received by 2024-01-11 at 2:00 PM ET for the bid to be considered responsive

**Important Directives:**
*   Direct all inquiries and communications regarding the bid solicitation to the specified Contracting Authority through the “Event Messages” tab in CanadaBuys (SAP Ariba)
*   Failure to comply with the above requirement may result in the bid being declared non-responsive

**Contact Information:**
*   Contracting Authority Name: Nabil Boujenoui (SPAC/PSPC)
*   Contact Email: nabil.boujenoui@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
*   URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18196577?extsite=MTgxOTY1NzdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Note: All terms and conditions mentioned above are subject to change and may be modified without notice.

**Trade Agreements:**
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Procurement Details:**
*   Category: Commercial Construction Services
*   UNSPSC Code: `72000000 – Building and Facility Construction and Maintenance Services`

--------------------------------------------------------------

Contracting Authority:
Departement des Travaux publics et des services gouvernementaux (PSPC), 11, rue Laurier, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada.
